title: Microwaves ovens U.S. unit shipments 2005 to 2019
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Unit shipments in millions, with a total of 15 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2010 to 2005.
Conversely, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2019 to 2016.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2016 to 2013.
Also, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2013 to 2010.
gold: Forecasts suggest that nearly 13.5 million microwave ovens will be shipped in the United States in 2019 , marking the product 's highest sales figure in years . Although quite a mature market , microwave oven shipments have fluctuated significantly over the past few decades . Between 2005 and 2013 total shipments fell from around 13.9 million to 9.2 million per year ; but in recent years the market has recovered to previous levels .
